name: Risk Control Limited
goal: Risk Control is an independent firm of risk specialists assisting major international institutions in developing and implementing effective and rigorous risk management.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: Directives 2009/65/EC, 2009/138/EC, 2011/61/EU and Regulations (EC) No 1060/2009 and (EU) No 648/2012
